# {%= name %} {%= badge("fury") %}

> {%= description %}

Why another flatten utility? Because this one is faster.

## Run benchmarks

```bash
node benchmark
```

## Run tests

```bash
npm test
```

## Install
{%= include("install-npm", {save: true}) %}
{%= include("install-bower", {save: true}) %}


## Usage

```js
var flatten = require('{%= name %}');

flatten(['a', ['b', ['c']], 'd', ['e']]);
//=> ['a', 'b', 'c', 'd', 'e']
```
